metadata.description: Relationship 'regular_staff' and all reports and report views.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Regular Staff relationship for non-contract staff.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The current salary for this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The person currently filling this position.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Emergency Contact details for this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Home contact details for this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The designation this person first held with the government.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Work contact details for this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The position held by this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The facility where this position works.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The district where this facility is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The job associated with this position.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The job classification for this position.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The starting salary for this person in their current position.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The age range for the person

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: CASE WHEN `demographic+birth_date` IS NULL THEN '?' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 17 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '-18' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 23 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '18-23' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 29 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '24-29' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 34 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '30-34' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 39 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '35-39' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 44 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '40-44' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 49 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '45-49' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 54 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '50-54' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 59 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '55-59' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 64 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '60-64' ELSE '65+' END

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: IF( MONTH(NOW()) - MONTH(`currentposition+start_date`) < 0, CONCAT( YEAR(NOW()) - YEAR(`currentposition+start_date`) - 1, ' year(s) ', 12 + MONTH(NOW()) - MONTH(`currentposition+start_date`), ' month(s)'), CONCAT(YEAR(NOW()) - YEAR(`currentposition+start_date`), ' year(s) ', MONTH(NOW()) - MONTH(`currentposition+start_date`), ' month(s)'))

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The district where this facility is located for limits.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The year the person started in this position.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The join date of this person based on the joining_job if present or the start_date otherwise.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The duration of service for this person.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: IF( MONTH(NOW()) - MONTH(`+join_date`) < 0, CONCAT( YEAR(NOW()) - YEAR(`+join_date`) - 1, ' year(s) ', 12 + MONTH(NOW()) - MONTH(`+join_date`), ' month(s)'), CONCAT(YEAR(NOW()) - YEAR(`+join_date`), ' year(s) ', MONTH(NOW()) - MONTH(`+join_date`), ' month(s)'))

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The formatted date the person is retiring.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Regular Health Staff Duration of Service (in years) in Current Posting.
